name: Thinking With Wormholes
description:
Thinking with Wormholes is a 2D, top down space arcade game. It is inspired by asteroids, but with a unique portal mechanic and a retro GameBoy inspired aesthetic.

The game is played completely with the mouse.

LMB is used to move.

RMB to create wormholes to teleport both your ship and asteroids through. You need to have both wormholes placed for things to travel through them. Placing wormholes alternates between the Dark/Light wormholes.

 Double Click to pass the tutorial and game over screen.

Strategy: Staying mobile is a good tactic!. 

Also, very importantly, you regenerate health after traveling through a wormhole, but only up until you get hit. 

If you are low on health you can attempt to teleport, but bear in mind that there might be something to crash into on your destination, which will damage you and instantly stop your regeneration.
